methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus on first focusable element/component in the form

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Triggers a validation on all applicable inner Quasar components

methods.name: resetValidation
methods.description: Resets the validation on all applicable inner Quasar components

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Manually trigger form validation and submit

methods.name: getValidationComponents
methods.description: Get an array of children Vue component instances that support Quasar validation API (derived from QField, or using useFormChild()/QFormChildMixin)

events.name: submit
events.description: Emitted when all validations have passed when tethered to a submit button

events.name: reset
events.description: Emitted when all validations have been reset when tethered to a reset button; It is recommended to manually reset the wrapped components models in this handler

events.name: validation-success
events.description: Emitted after a validation was triggered and all inner Quasar components models are valid

events.name: validation-error
events.description: Emitted after a validation was triggered and at least one of the inner Quasar components models are NOT valid

autofocus.description: Focus first focusable element on initial component render

no-error-focus.description: Do not try to focus on first component that has a validation error when submitting form

no-reset-focus.description: Do not try to focus on first component when resetting form

greedy.description: Validate all fields in form (by default it stops after finding the first invalid field with synchronous validation)
